column3: Why this url? Seems the current url equivalent is: https://docs.transifex.com/client/installing-the-client\nBased on: https://web.archive.org/web/20161011000624/http://docs.transifex.com/client/setup/
Since we have zero maintainers on Windows, I think this can be safely removed. More so the that the link to the transifex install instructions is identical to the linux one.
